span.p: Check if the "lastVersion" is available for all platforms (temurin)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Bump JDK17 version for Linux images in the Alpine Linux Dockerfile (dockerfile)
